title: My pixel 1 is bricked, I need help.
content:
I take phone on the charger for night, after that, at morning, my phone is just not turning on, when I connected my phone to pc that was connected like "HS-usb qloader 9008".
Guys from XDA said that phone goes into edl mode and can be recovered by flashing, but they don't have flashing files. Where I can get it?
